N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3000.7 - Final EIS procedure

State Regulations
(a) If, after the completion of the draft EIS, the receipt of comments thereon and the
close of the public hearing (if any) held thereon, the issuer determines that
the proposed action of the issuer may have a significant effect upon the
environment, the issuer shall prepare or cause to be prepared a final EIS, and
cause said final EIS to be filed, in accordance with the provisions of 6 NYCRR
617.6
and 6 NYCRR
617.7
(h) and (i). However, if the issuer requests an
applicant to prepare a supplemental environmental impact report as provided in
subdivision (d) of section
3000.5
of this Part, the issuer
shall not commence preparation of the final EIS nor cause its preparation to be
undertaken until a completed supplemental environmental impact report is
received. (b) Upon completion of the
final EIS, the issuer shall prepare a notice of completion of a final EIS in
the same form as is required for a notice of completion of a draft EIS pursuant
to section
3000.6
(b) of this

Part (except that the notice will not contain the statement described in
paragraph [4] of subdivision [b] of section
3000.6
), and the issuer shall send
and file said notices of completion of the final EIS in the same manner as is
required for circulating and filing notices of completion of the draft EIS
pursuant to sections
3000.6
(c) and (d)
of this Part. Copies of the final EIS shall be filed in the same manner as is
required for a draft EIS pursuant to section
3000.6
(d) of this

Part. (c) The issuer shall maintain
files open to public inspection at its principal office of all final EIS's and
notices of completion for all final EIS's prepared at its request by an
applicant or which it has prepared or caused to be
prepared. Notes
